text: Wh.. Wh.. What are you doing? Quickly remove your hand~~
Oops... I placed the mouse in the wrong place!
Wh.. Wh.. What do you want?
Meow meow meow?
I'm scared (ノ≧∇≦)ノ
Indecent! Help!
In that case, I'll have to use force!
I'm.. I'm.. I'm getting angry!
Don't touch or move around!
T.. T.. Truly shameless!
Hentai!
Guess what I'm going to say?
I've heard a lot of life lessons from the Frog Prince.
Do you want to play a game of airplane combat?
The button says 'Do not click' on it.
What, do you want to play a game with me?
I heard this is how you go dancing!
Don't you love me anymore? Sob, sob, sob~
Do you want to meet my big sister?
Do you want to see my little sister?
Do you want to switch the character model?
Do you like changing outfits and playing?
What role would you like to play this time?
Transformation!
Let's see what happens next!
Do you want to take a picture of me? Say cheese!
How about we take a photo together!
Just smile and it'll be perfect!
Do you want to know more about me?
This is where my moving history is recorded.
What would you like to know more about me?
Is it time to say goodbye?
Sob, sob, see you later...
Don't abandon me...
Will we ever meet again?
Hmph, you'll regret this!

seasons.text: New Year's Day is here, and a new year has begun. This year is {year}.
It's Valentine's Day again. Did you find a partner this year in {year}?

Tody is Star Wars Day, May the Fourth Be with You~
Children's Day is here. Happy times are always short. It would be great if we never grew up...
